name: tris3d-canvas
description: is a canvas to play tic tac toe in 3d

scripts.build: npm run build_docs; npm run build_example
scripts.build_docs: npm run cp_package.json; npm run homepage
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > docs/index.md; cat README.md >> docs/index.md
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; git push origin master

/* about three.js dependency */: three is a peer dependency of three-orbitcontrols
infact installation command is: npm install three tris3d-canvas
hence three is required as development dependency
cause it will be the one required by three-orbitcontrols
